import React from 'react'; import Hero from './Hero.png'; import Mission from './Mission.png'; // Ensure this path is correct import './Page.css'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import Values from './Values.png' import Growth from './Growth.png' function Page() { return (
{/* Hero Section with Image on the Left and Text on the Right */}

SafeMax Security

Protecting What Matters with Comprehensive VAPT Services and Strategic Cybersecurity.





{/* Cards for Mission, Core Values, and Growth Story */} Mission of SafeMax Security SafeMax Security is committed to providing cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions to protect businesses from emerging cyber threats. Through tailored Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT) services, we ensure the security of digital assets and sensitive data, offering continuous risk assessments and safeguarding critical systems. Core Values of SafeMax Security At SafeMax Security, we emphasize precision, proactive threat hunting, and a client-centric approach to deliver tailored solutions. We focus on innovation, integrating the latest technologies to strengthen defenses, and prioritizing resilience to ensure security in a rapidly changing digital landscape. Growth Story Founded in 2020, SafeMax Security quickly became a leader in cybersecurity services, reaching a $75 million valuation by 2023. With a focus on innovation and customer success, SafeMax aims to surpass a $200 million valuation by 2024, further cementing its position as a trusted cybersecurity provider.











); } export default Page;
